input.sentences: it was the first day of vacation bible school | and the volunteers were ready for the kids to arrive .
they started out with fun songs to get the children motivated .
the children gathered round as ashuman told the story of [male] and the whale .

output.sentences: A group of students started a charity to promote healthy reading habits.
Many children showed up for story time.
First a book was read to the children, activating their imaginations.
Afterwards, the children all received free books and gift bags before taking pictures together.
One boy in particular was so happy that he couldn't stop smiling the whole event.
